#summary 配置文件示例
#labels Featured

== 使用UNIGRAM分词 ==
{{{
# common:
root = /opt/bamboo
processor_root = $root/processor
max_token_length = 8
verbose = 1

# models and lexicons
unigram_lexicon = $root/index/unigram.idx
number_trailing_lexicon = $root/index/number_trailing.idx
single_combination_lexicon = $root/index/user_combine.idx
maxforward_combination_lexicon = $root/index/user_combine.idx
break_lexicon = $root/index/break.idx

process_chain = prepare, unigram, single_combine, maxforward_combine
prepare_characterize = 0

break_min_length = 5
ele_lambda = 0.5
}}}

== 使用CRF分词 ==
{{{
# common:
root = /opt/bamboo
processor_root = $root/processor
max_token_length = 8
verbose = 1

# models and lexicons
unigram_lexicon = $root/index/unigram.idx
crf_token_model = $root/index/crf.model
number_trailing_lexicon = $root/index/number_trailing.idx
single_combination_lexicon = $root/index/user_combine.idx
maxforward_combination_lexicon = $root/index/user_combine.idx
break_lexicon = $root/index/break.idx

process_chain = prepare, crf, single_combine, maxforward_combine
prepare_characterize = 0

break_min_length = 5
ele_lambda = 0.5

}}}
